name: Vimmel
description:
Description

The Myll’er have launched a friendly invasion against Vimmelriket!

Take control of one of the Myll’ers best workers - Whimsi, Array, Clutts, or Muddle - and help them complete their tasks. Use your tractor beam to collect specific objects from a list and bring them back to the mothership. The player who turns in an object will be rewarded with points. Whoever has the most points at the end of the game wins!

How to play

At the start of a game, you will be presented with a list of objects at the top of your screen. Your goal is to fly around the island and try to find one of the objects on the list. 

Once you have found the object you are looking for, pick it up with our tractor beam.

Then transport it to the motherships beam.

When an object is brought to the mothership you will be rewarded with points based on how valuable the object is. An object's value is represented with a crown in the list. Once an object has been turned in a new object will take its place in the list.

This keeps going until the timer runs out, at which point the player with the highest score wins!

Recommended specs

CPU: i5-4690 or better 

GPU: GTX 960 for 1080p GTX 1660 Ti for 4K 

Storage: At least 1.08 GB of free storage 

RAM: 8 GB or more
